=== Official Contacts ===

The official contacts for the Ubuntu New Mexico Team are Ubuntu Members <nowiki>[[MichaelRimbert| Michael Rimbert]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[dthomasdigital|David Thomas]]</nowiki>.

=== New Mexico LoCo Council ===
The New Mexico LoCo is now run by the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~nmlococouncil | Ubuntu New Mexico LoCo Council]]</nowiki>.

The council shares responsibilities for LoCo administration and decision-making.  Below are listed the NM LoCo council menbers, along with their administration responsibilities of the various New Mexico LoCo Team Resources:

 {*} <nowiki>[[mrimbert|Michael Rimbert]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu Member, New Mexico LoCo Team Contact & Co-Founding Member, NM Team Launchpad Administrator, Ubuntu IRC op team, and NM IRC Channel Operator -- mrimbert@ubuntu.com

 {*} <nowiki>[[protonchris|Chris Brotherton]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu New Mexico Team Webmaster, Mailing list Administrator, and NM IRC Channel Operator - chris@protonlab.net 

 {*} <nowiki>[[dthomasdigital|David Thomas]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu Member, New Mexico LoCo Team Contact & Co-Founding Member, NM Team Launchpad Administrator, NM IRC Channel Operator, and Wiki Administrator - dthomas@ubuntu.com
